{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.17416v1", "title": "A relation between Turaev coaction, Goncharov--Brown coaction and the
  reduced coaction Lie algebra", "summary": "We present a formula that relates the Turaev coaction and the Goncharov-Brown
coaction. Motivated by this relation, we introduce the reduced coaction
equation. The skew-symmetric solutions to this equation form a Lie algebra
under Ihara bracket.", "main_category": "math.RA", "categories": "math.RA", "published": "2025-04-24T10:16:50Z"}
